English.Char_Desc_45: Synchronize your data quick and easy...
English.Char_Desc_80: Synchronize your data quick and easy...
English.Char_Desc_250: SSuite Kronoz Sync-Master is a very small and capable application to help you synchronize any folder or drive that you may have. It is possible to synchronize both selected folders or to synchronize in one direction only.
English.Char_Desc_450:
SSuite Kronoz Sync-Master is a very small and capable application to help you synchronize any folder or drive that you may have. It is possible to synchronize both selected folders or to synchronize in one direction only.
Please note that the rate of synchronization depends on your system's speed and hard drive's performance.
No Java or DotNet required, Green Energy Software!
English.Char_Desc_2000:
SSuite Kronoz Sync-Master is a very small and capable application to help you synchronize any folder or drive that you may have. It is possible to synchronize both selected folders or to synchronize in one direction only.
Please note that the rate of synchronization depends on your system's speed and hard drive's performance.
This application is very easy to use, just make your selection of folders or drives to be synchronized, and click on the direction of data transfer.
This application is also completely and absolutely portable.
Come have a look at our new free Online Office Suite:
https://office.ssuiteoffice.com/
No Java or DotNet required, Green Energy Software! Saving the planet one bit at a time.
